Reviews.Title: good value
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Well worth the money.I was able to run a camera to a remote spot outside my house with minimal effort due to the way the cable was wrapped(easy to unroll) and the size of the bnc connectors allowing me to be able to drill small holes in the side of my home.

ProductInfo.Features:
Video and Power Cable for Zmodo CCTV Security Cameras
100 Feet Video & Power Cable in Black Color
CCTV cable with BNC Plugs
Pre-Made BNC Video - Power(2.1mm) Cable
Indoor and Outdoor use
ProductInfo.Name: Acelevel Premium Quality 200 Feet Video Power BNC RCA Cable for Zmodo CCTV Cameras
